newsitem.title: GERMANY: COMMERZBANK SEES ADIDAS SHARES AT 250 DMK.
newsitem.headline: COMMERZBANK SEES ADIDAS SHARES AT 250 DMK.

text.p: Commerzbank said on Thursday that it reaffirmed a "buy" recommendation for sportswear maker Adidas AG and set a price target of 250 marks for the share over the next six months.
Adidas shares were trading at 230.40 marks at 1052 GMT, up 12.40 marks from Wednesday's close.
Commerzbank said that even after six months, the shares should keep rising amid further business growth and the planned inclusion in 1998 in the 30-share DAX index.
Commerzbank noted that Adidas' first-half results released on Wednesday showed continued rapid business growth, a rise in profit margins and a 56 percent rise in the company's order backlog.
